resources.string: "Email client not found on your phone. Please send us an email: shereworkshop@gmail.com"
These is a new version published and you connecting the wifi, it will auto upgrade to newest version.
New version was prepared, click to install.
"您的积分：%1$s 消耗%2$s积分便可永久去除程序中的所有广告(程序升级后不受影响)。"
"清除广告成功！完全退出程序后再次进入将不会出现广告。 注：请不要随意在系统的设置中清除此程序的数据。 感谢您的支持。"
消耗积分失败，请稍后再试。
"Can't not found Google Play on your device."
"Thanks for you are using EZ Tools. If you are willing to, please lend EZ Tools a little strength. "

"EZTools support remove AD now! We are so sorry that EZTools has an AD,we are try our best make EZTools more powerful.EZTools is free,so we have to show an AD in it, if not, we would not exists, sorry again. We hope you can understand :)"
You can find easy way in the menu of EasyTouch.
"I can't delete the notification'EasyTouch is running'"

Because Android 4.3 new features, in order to let the user know what apps are running, all suspended app must display a notification in the notification bar, we are so sorry. But you can change the notification(GENERAL SETTINGS-NOTIFICATION BAR SETTING), make it more make sense.
"Finished the task, but i can't get coins"

Please check the task required again(some task may need register) to complete the task,as has completed but did not get gold coins, please write to us: sheresupport@foxmail.com for you to handle, sorry for that.
"1.Please check the phone network is normally, are there security software disable the network access of EasyTouch? 2.some third-party ROM maybe disable AD network access."
"Can't normally lock screen(screen open after lock screen)."
Some 4.0 OS will happen this problem. You can change the setting of screen type(ROOT lock screen), then try again.

ROOT permissions is the highest permission in Android OS, Some features require user authorization ROOT permissions to complete. If your phone does not have ROOT permission, please google for more information.

"1.If you running a 'Screen Filter' similar app, maybe can't press the install button when you installing an app. 2.Check whether open 'Unknown sources' setting(System settings -> Security -> check Unknown sources). Other question, please write to us: sheresupport@foxmail.com for you(With screenshot if probably) to handle."

Coins will not be deducted when the theme download fails, you can try again to download and install. If the download fails repeatedly, I hope you can give us a letter: sheresupport@foxmail.com, help us to solve your problem.

"Why can't i delete the notification(EasyTouch is running)?
Because Android 4.3 new features, in order to let the user know what apps are running, all suspended app must display a notification in the notification bar, we are so sorry."
"If you running a 'Screen Filter' similar app, maybe can't press the install button when you installing an app."
How to auto-start about MIUI OS
"1、Settings-Apps-EasyTouch 2、Manage premissions-open Trust this app 3、Manage premissions-open Auto-start"
How to auto-start about HUAWEI Emotion UI
"Rooting is the Android equivalent of jailbreaking, a means of unlocking the operating system. Some features(Back key,cap screen...) require authorization ROOT permissions to complete."
You just activated lock screen function.
"1. Now you can't uninstall EasyTouch in normal method. You can uninstall through the icon of app list."
2. Or uninstall through the menu in EasyTouch.
